1.title: Park Redevelopment
1.description: Redevelop the local park, installing play equipment for children and a picnic area.

2.title: Expansion of the Community Library
2.description: Expand the community library, providing new books and digital resources.

3.title: Environmental Protection Initiative
3.description: Support local environmental protection activities, including cleaning and tree planting.

4.title: Establishment of a Local Art Gallery
4.description: Establish an art gallery to exhibit works of local artists.

5.title: Recreation Center for the Elderly
5.description: Establish a recreation center for the elderly to promote health and social interaction.

6.title: Youth Sports Facility
6.description: Establish a sports facility for youth to promote health and teamwork.

7.title: Local History Museum
7.description: Establish a museum to introduce the local history with educational exhibits.

8.title: Community Health Clinic
8.description: Establish a health clinic for low-income residents to provide basic medical services.

9.title: Community Traffic Improvement Project
9.description: Improve the local transportation network, enhancing public transit access and safety.

10.title: Local Education Support Program
10.description: Provide additional educational resources to local schools, expanding learning opportunities for students.
